entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support in parameters in VB #57111
  • Go To Base/Implementation should be more flexible when signatures do not match #57110
  • Add missing binaries for version stamping by compiler #57107
    17.0
  • Applying a suggested code change fails to apply to the solution -With Recording #57106
  • ReadOnlySpan optimization doesn't work with ternary #57102
  • error CS0121: "The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties" after upgrade from net5.0 to 6.0.0-rc.1.21451.3 #57101
  • InvalidCastException in ValueTracking #57100

Closed

  • Show region label at #endregion #56507
  • Add explicit cast on -= operator produces wrong code #57085

PullRequests

Created

  • Use release version of Debugger.Contracts #57114
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move feature check from lexer to binder. #57113
    Area-Compilers
  • IDECoreBenchmarks Changes #57112
    Area-IDE
  • Add quick runtime checks to ensure core workspace invariants hold. #57109
    Area-IDE
  • Added filescoped namespaces as a structure able to be collapsed #57108
    Area-IDE
  • Handle potential stack overflow in regex parsing. #57105
    Area-IDE
  • Honor MemberNotNullWhen in assignments #57103
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57099
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Add experiment to disable weak compilation refs in the compilation tracker #57037
    Area-IDE, Next
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Null annotate FileCodeModel and the code model service #57026
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support params Span<T> #57104
    Area-Compilers
  • Refactoring of completion providers for embedded languages #57071
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add CallerArgumentExpression to VB language feature status doc #55230
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57098
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57086
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Inline Diagnostics: fix rps regression #57094
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57096
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57097
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57116
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Update extract method to support top-level statements #57084
    Area-IDE
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix analysis of MemberNotNullWhen in patterns #57083
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Make path comparison case insensitive #56477
    Area-IDE
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't specifically dismiss the sig help session on down key press #51241
    Area-IDE
  • Remove cast tweak cases from https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/57061 #57080
    Area-IDE
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Remove #pragma suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa #56974
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer to simply to an alias if it has a different meaning #57001
    Area-IDE
